item.title: Setup amd64 Ubuntu VM on Mac
item.description:
This should be applied to Intel/Apple Silicon Mac.

Follow this tutorial should help to install required lib (qemu and utm)

  1. Create new VM Configuration from scratch, select Architecture to x86_64, and System to Standard PC

  2. New Drive for Hard Disk and Import Drive to select Ubuntu installation ISO image.

Enjoy!

item.title: Change the default python to Python3.8 on Ubuntu 20.04 fresh install
item.description:
Just realized there is a specific package to resolve.

When got the fresh installed Ubuntu Focal Fossa server edition, you can use python3 but the default python has not set yet.

 1ubuntu@prime:~$ python
 2
 3Command 'python' not found, did you mean:
 4
 5 command 'python3' from deb python3
 6 command 'python' from deb python-is-python3
 7
 8ubuntu@prime:~$ python3
 9Python 3.8.10 (default, Nov 26 2021, 20:14:08)
10

Follow the official doc to update-alternatives then got this:

1ubuntu@prime:~$ sudo update-alternatives --set python /usr/bin/python3.8
2
3update-alternatives: error: no alternatives for python
4

There are two methods to resolve:

Method 1:

1ubuntu@prime:~$ sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python3.8 1
2
3ubuntu@prime:~$ sudo update-alternatives --config python
4There is only one alternative in link group python (providing /usr/bin/python): /usr/bin/python3
5Nothing to configure.
6

Method 2: use the python-is-python3 package

1ubuntu@prime:~$ sudo apt install -y python-is-python3

1ubuntu@prime:~$ python -V
2Python 3.8.10

Enjoy!
